revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #23 Qualot |image = [[File:Qualot.png]] |caption = Even in places of constant rain and high humidity, this Berry's plant grows healthy and strong. |growtime = 1h 20m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 20% |points = 550 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} === Description === '''Qualot''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, sweet and sour and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]], [[Pecha]] and [[Aspear]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 50 secs || 16 mins 40 secs || 41 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 20 mins - 2 hours 40 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 35 mins 33 secs -
1 hour 11 mins 6 secs || 8 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Qualot berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || || || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] |-style="height: 50px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
[[Aspear]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
[[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
[[Aspear]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]]
[[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
[[Aspear]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |} {{Berries}}
